database-object.create: create or replace view vw_results as select u.id id, u.USERNAME username, u.lastPosition lastposition, m.id mid, f.SCORE1 fsc1, f.score2 fsc2, m.score1 msc1, m.score2 msc2, sign(f.score1-f.score2) dif_f, sign(m.score1-m.score2) dif_m, case when m.score1 = -1 then 0 else decode (sign (sign(f.score1-f.score2) - sign(m.score1-m.score2)), 0, 1, 0) end points, case when f.score1=m.score1 and f.score2=m.score2 then 1 else 0 end scores, case when f.score1=m.score1 and f.score2=m.score2 and m.score1 + m.score2 >= 4 then m.score1+m.score2-3 else 0 end bonus from forecast f inner join match m on m.id=f.match_id right outer join player u on u.id = f.user_id

create or replace view vw_scores as select vwr.id, vwr.lastposition, vwr.username name, sum(points) winners, sum(scores) scores, sum(bonus) scorebonus, sum(points) + sum(scores) +sum(bonus) total from vw_results vwr left outer join winningteamforecast wtf on vwr.id=wtf.USER_ID group by vwr.id, vwr.username, vwr.lastposition order by total desc

create or replace view vw_teams as select id, name, sum(presenceValue) + sum(victoryValue) total from ( select t.id, name, m.presenceValue, decode (sign(m.SCORE1-m.SCORE2), 1, m.victoryValue, 0) victoryValue from team t inner join match m on m.TEAM1_ID=t.id union all select t.id, name, m.presenceValue, decode (sign(m.SCORE2-m.SCORE1), 1, m.victoryValue, 0) victoryValue from team t inner join match m on m.TEAM2_ID=t.id) group by id, name

create or replace view vw_classification as select vs.*, vt.name bonusteam, vt.total teambonus, vs.winners+vs.scores*2+vs.scorebonus+nvl(vt.total,0) grandtotal from vw_scores vs left outer join winningteamforecast wtf on wtf.user_id=vs.ID left outer join vw_teams vt on vt.id=wtf.team_id order by grandtotal desc
